code: var shorten=function shorten(title){var splitTitle=title.split(" ");var newTitle=" ".concat(splitTitle[0]," ").concat(splitTitle[1]," ");return newTitle;};var shortCatgory=function shortCatgory(title){var splitTitle=title.split(" ");var newTitle=" ".concat(splitTitle[0]," ").concat(splitTitle[1]," ").concat(splitTitle[2]," ").concat(splitTitle[3],"  ");return newTitle;};var shortBrand=function shortBrand(title){var splitTitle=title.split(" ");var newTitle=" ".concat(splitTitle[0]);return newTitle;};var isInCart=function isInCart(state,id){var result=!!state.selectedItems.find(function(item){return item.id===id;});return result;};var quantityCount=function quantityCount(state,id){var index=state.selectedItems.findIndex(function(item){return item.id===id;});if(index===-1){return false;}else{return state.selectedItems[index].quantity;}};export{shorten,shortCatgory,isInCart,quantityCount,shortBrand};
